DOC.brief_summary: Strengthening exercise Pelvic Floor Muscles ( PFM ) first line treatment female pelvic floor dysfunction . Actually best position facilitate PFM force controversial different study . The aim study assess effect ankle position pelvic ﬂoor muscle force PFM exercise . This clinical trial study carry 58 woman age 25-55 year relaxation pelvic floor muscle refer woman 's clinic educational hospital Mashhad University Medical Sciences 1389 . After clinical examination confirmation pelvic floor muscle relaxation , woman randomize divided 3 group , strengthen exercise PFM stand position passive ankle dorsi ﬂexion ( wooden surface 15 degree angle ) ( n=20 ) , active ankle plantar ﬂexion arm ( stand toe ) ( n=20 ) horizontal stand position ( n=19 ) 8 week . PFM exercise instructed woman use pamphlet face face education . They follow every two week telephone call ask refer woman 's clinic 4 & 8 week . Pelvic floor muscle strength assess brink score intervention . Data analyze use analytic-descriptive statistic .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Ankle Position Pelvic Floor Muscle Force With Relaxation Pelvic Floor Muscles Syndrome
